thread.title: Ground News - West Africa's early heat wave signals climate change's impact

author: EHN
title: Ground News - West Africa's early heat wave signals climate change's impact
text:
Summary by EHN West Africa experienced an unprecedented early heat wave, intensified by global warming.Delger Erdenesanaa reports for The New York Times.In short: Climate change has made extreme heat events in West Africa, like the recent heat wave, ten times more likely, exacerbating the heat index significantly.T...
